lead_paragraph: Dracula's wife, Vanessa, comes back to life and attacks Raymond who has a waxworks museum, where he displays notorious monsters and murderers. Vanessa puts a curse on Raymond, turning him into a vampire.
snippet: Dracula's wife, Vanessa, comes back to life and attacks Raymond who has a waxworks museum, where he displays notorious monsters and murderers. Vanessa puts a curse on Raymond, turning him into a vampire.
